WorkItem.Description:
I like to copy the gear out to a text file to read it easier and record various sets for comparison. I can easily delete extra information I do not care about (for this purpose), but I have to manually type in each gem and enchant on each item.
 
Suggestion: Include Gems (and their color) and Enchants along with the items on the infomation copied out to the clipboard.
Suggested format:
Head		Noth's Curse(my)		Chaotic Skyflare Diamond(m), Potent Monarch Topaz(o), Arcanum of Blissful Mending
 
Thank you for a great program.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request] Gems and Enchants in Tools/Copy Character Stats To Clipboard

Comments.Message: See the Current Gear/Enchants/Buffs chart, and export that.
